Author: GitHub
Description:
Cassidy Williams has wanted a dedicated color palette manager for years, relying on text files until now. In this short, she uses the GitHub Copilot SDK and Plan Mode to scope, build, and debug the app in under an hour. Watch as the AI even implements features to extract colors from images.

#GitHubCopilot #GitHubCopilotSDK #GitHub

Title: Building a color palette app with GitHub Copilot SDK
